Container.Name: bytestash
Container.Project: Code snippet manager for storing and organizing code snippets
Container.Overview: ByteStash is a web-based application for managing and organizing code snippets with a clean, modern interface. Features include syntax highlighting, categorization, and easy sharing.

Config.Name: Web Interface Port
Config.Description: Port for web interface. Change the left number if you want to use a different port to access the interface.

Config.Name: Snippets Directory
Config.Description: Directory where code snippets will be stored
